game_engine.entities package¶

game_engine.entities.player module¶

class game_engine.entities.player.Player(cell: game_engine.field.cell.Cell, name: str, is_bot: bool = False, turn: int = 0)¶

Bases: object

This is a player object

Parameters

  • name (str) – players name

  • cell (Cell) – players location cell

  • is_bot (bool) – describe is player bot

  • turn (int) – players turn number

Variables

  • health_max – players max health

  • health – players current health

  • bombs_max – players max bombs

  • bombs – players current bombs

  • arrows_max – players max arrows

  • arrows – players current arrows

  • treasure – players treasure

  • is_alive – describe is player alive

  • is_active – describe is player active

can_take_treasure() → bool¶

return players ability to take treasure

drop_treasure() → game_engine.entities.treasure.Treasure¶

remove player Treasure

get_allowed_abilities(is_tr_under: bool) → dict[game_engine.global_env.enums.Actions, bool]¶

returns dict of players abilities

heal()¶

set player health to max

move(cell: game_engine.field.cell.Cell)¶

change player cell parameter

restore_armory()¶

set player arrows and bombs to max

restore_arrows()¶

set player arrows to max

restore_bombs()¶

set player bombs to max

shoot_bow() → bool¶

reduce player arrows. return true if player has an arrow

take_damage() → game_engine.entities.treasure.Treasure | None¶

damage player and drop treasure if exists

throw_bomb() → bool¶

reduce player bombs. return true if player has bomb

to_dict() → dict¶

convert player object to dict
